description: Enables or disables additional Amazon CloudWatch metrics for the specified CloudFront distribution. The additional metrics incur an additional cost. For more information, see Viewing additional CloudFront distribution metrics in the Amazon CloudFront Developer Guide.

parameters.name: DistributionId
parameters.description: The ID of the distribution that you are enabling metrics for.

parameters.name: MonitoringSubscription
parameters.description: A monitoring subscription. This structure contains information about whether additional CloudWatch metrics are enabled for a given CloudFront distribution. RealtimeMetricsSubscriptionConfig (dict) --- A subscription configuration for additional CloudWatch metrics. A flag that indicates whether additional CloudWatch metrics are enabled for a given CloudFront distribution.

nested_params.name: RealtimeMetricsSubscriptionConfig
nested_params.description: A subscription configuration for additional CloudWatch metrics.

nested_params.name: RealtimeMetricsSubscriptionStatus
nested_params.description: A flag that indicates whether additional CloudWatch metrics are enabled for a given CloudFront distribution.

nested_items.name: MonitoringSubscription
nested_items.description: A monitoring subscription. This structure contains information about whether additional CloudWatch metrics are enabled for a given CloudFront distribution.

nested_items.name: RealtimeMetricsSubscriptionConfig
nested_items.description: A subscription configuration for additional CloudWatch metrics.

nested_items.name: RealtimeMetricsSubscriptionStatus
nested_items.description: A flag that indicates whether additional CloudWatch metrics are enabled for a given CloudFront distribution.
